Class CryptoUtils

  • java.lang.Object

        public static String decrypt​(String encryptedString,
                             SecretKey secretKey,
                             String encryptionScheme)
                      throws InvalidKeyException,
                             InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                             NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                             NoSuchPaddingException,
                             IllegalBlockSizeException,
                             BadPaddingException
        This method return a decrypted base64 encoded binary message
        Parameters:
        encryptedString - Encrypted data to decrypt, base64 encoded
        secretKey - SecretKey
        encryptionScheme - Encryption Scheme
        Returns:
        Decoded and decrypted plain text data.
        Throws:
        InvalidKeyException - If exception
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - If exception
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - If exception
        NoSuchPaddingException - If exception
        IllegalBlockSizeException - If exception
        BadPaddingException - If exception
